history.proof: split. - intros H x [H1 H2]. sauto lq: on depth: 3. - intros. hauto lq: on use: is_finite_correct unfold: real, is_finite, Rbar_is_upper_bound, is_ub_Rbar inv: Rbar.

exceptions.exn: In environment E : R -> Prop l : Rbar H : is_ub_Rbar E l x : Rbar H1 : is_finite x H2 : E x Unable to unify "is_ub_Rbar E l" with "Rbar_le x l".
In environment E : R -> Prop l : Rbar H : is_ub_Rbar E l x : Rbar H1 : is_finite x H2 : E x Unable to unify "is_finite x" with "Rbar_le x l".
In environment E : R -> Prop l : Rbar H : is_ub_Rbar E l x : Rbar H1 : is_finite x H2 : E x Unable to unify "E x" with "Rbar_le x l".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment E : R -> Prop l : Rbar H : Rbar_is_upper_bound (fun x : Rbar => is_finite x /\\ E x) l Unable to unify "Rbar_is_upper_bound (fun x : Rbar => is_finite x /\\ E x) l" with "is_ub_Rbar E l".

original: intros E l. split. - intros H x [H1 H2]. apply H. split. + apply H1. + apply H2. - intros H x H1 [H2 H3]. apply H. split. + apply H2. + apply H3.
